import './Novidades.css' import spider from './Assets/sp2.png' import tekken from './Assets/tekken.jpg' import bd3 from './Assets/bd3.jpg' import alan from './Assets/Alan2.jpg' import yakuza from './Assets/yakuza.jpg' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const Novidades = () => { useEffect(() => { const [tamanho , setTamanho] = useState(''); function Redimen(){ if(window.innerWidth < 720){ setTamanho(1); }else{ setTamanho(2); } } Redimen(); window.addEventListener("resize",Redimen) return() =>{ window.removeEventListener("resize", Redimen) } }) return (
